description: Overview of power consumption for RON lab and others

targets.query:
from(bucket: "bucket1")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
  	r._measurement == "show environment power" and
    (
    r._field == "powersup/power_summary/tot_pow_input_actual_draw" and
    (r.source =~ /r25-eu-spdc/) // Get only the 92xx
    )
    )
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time", "source"])
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> unique(column: "source")
  |> sort(columns: ["source"], desc: true)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["source"], valueColumn: "_value")

from(bucket: "bucket1")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
  	r._measurement == "show environment power" and
    (
    r._field == "powersup/power_summary/tot_pow_capacity" and
    (r.source =~ /r25-eu-spdc/) // Get only the 92xx
    ))
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time", "source"])
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> unique(column: "source")
  |> sort(columns: ["source"], desc: true)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["source"], valueColumn: "_value")

src = from(bucket: "bucket1")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "show environment power" and
  r._field == "powersup/power_summary/tot_pow_input_actual_draw" and
    (r.source =~ /r25-eu-spdc/) // Get only the 92xx
    )
  |> window(every: 5m)
  |> mean()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "_start"])

co2eqkwh = from(bucket: "bucket1")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
  	  r._measurement == "electricity-map" and
      r._field == "carbonIntensity")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> window(every: 5m)
  |> mean()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "_start"])

j = join(
	tables: {t1: src, t2: co2eqkwh},
    on: ["cc", "_time"],
	)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    	region: r.region_t1,
    	country: r.country_t1,
      _value: r._value_t2,
	}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "cc", "source", "subscription", "_measurement"])
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> unique(column: "source")
  |> sort(columns: ["source"], desc: true)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["source", "cc"], valueColumn: "_value")
 	|> yield()

from(bucket: "bucket1")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Cisco-IOS-XR-sysadmin-fretta-envmon-ui:environment/oper/power/location/pem_attributes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "co2_emission")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time", "source", "country", "region"])
  |> last()

panels.description:
//Carbon emission (extrapolated to 1h)

targets.query:
//Carbon emission (extrapolated to 1h)

//Gives us the carbon emissions per hour (W x gCO₂eq/kWh = (J/s) x gCO2eq / kWh = (J/s) x gCO2eq / (1000Wh) = (J/s) x gCO2eq / (3600x1000J) = JxgCO2eq/(3600sx1000J) = gCO2eq/(3600sx1000) = gCO2eq/1000h)

src = from(bucket: "bucket1")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "show environment power" and
  r._field == "powersup/power_summary/tot_pow_input_actual_draw" and
    (r.source =~ /r25-eu-spdc/) // Get only the 92xx
    )
  |> window(every: 5m)
  |> mean()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "_start"])

co2eqkwh = from(bucket: "bucket1")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
  	  r._measurement == "electricity-map" and
      r._field == "carbonIntensity")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> window(every: 5m)
  |> mean()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "_start"])

j = join(
	tables: {t1: src, t2: co2eqkwh},
    on: ["cc", "_time"],
	)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    	region: r.region_t1,
    	country: r.country_t1,
      _value: float(v: r._value_t1) * float(v: r._value_t2) / 1000.0,
	}))
    |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "cc", "source", "subscription", "_measurement"])
    // For sorting data (replaces |>last())
    |> group()
    |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
    |> unique(column: "source")
    |> sort(columns: ["source"], desc: true)
    |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["source", "cc"], valueColumn: "_value")
  	|> yield()

  	r._measurement == "show environment power" and
    (
    r._field == "powersup/power_summary/tot_pow_input_actual_draw" and
    (r.source =~ /rs1-core.*/ or r.source =~ /rs[0-9]-mgm-tor/ or r.source == "Yavin-129" or r.source =~ /rs[0-9]-mgm-mor/ or r.source =~ /ipn[0-9][0-9]-eu-spdc/ or r.source == "Tatooine-136" or r.source =~ /rl[0-9][0-9][0-9]-eu-spdc/ or r.source =~ /cl[0-9][0-9][0-9]-eu-spdc/) //Get only the 93xx
    )
    )
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time", "source"])
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> unique(column: "source")
  |> sort(columns: ["source"], desc: true)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["source"], valueColumn: "_value")

from(bucket: "bucket1")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "apic-switch")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pIn")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["_time", "name"])
  |> keep(columns: ["pIn", "name", "_time"])
  |> sum(column: "pIn")
  |> group(columns: ["name"])
  |> last(column: "pIn")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["name"], valueColumn: "pIn")

targets.query:
from(bucket: "bucket1")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r.device_type == "cisco-8k" and
    r._measurement == "Cisco-IOS-XR-envmon-oper:power-management/rack/producers/producer-nodes/producer-node" and 
    (
    r._field == "pem_info_array/current_in_a" or
    r._field == "pem_info_array/voltage_in_a" or 
    r._field == "pem_info_array/current_in_b" or
    r._field == "pem_info_array/voltage_in_b"
    ))
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {"pem_info_array/voltage_in_a": "voltage_in_a", "pem_info_array/current_in_a": "current_in_a", "pem_info_array/voltage_in_b": "voltage_in_b", "pem_info_array/current_in_b": "current_in_b"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    power_in_a: if float(v: r.current_in_a) > 100 then (float(v: r.voltage_in_a)/1000.0) * (float(v: r.current_in_a)/1000.0) else float(v: r.voltage_in_a) * float(v: r.current_in_a),
    power_in_b: if float(v: r.current_in_b) > 100 then (float(v: r.voltage_in_b)/1000.0) * (float(v: r.current_in_b)/1000.0) else float(v: r.voltage_in_b) * float(v: r.current_in_b),
   }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    _value: r.power_in_a + r.power_in_b,
  }))
  |> last(column: "_value")
  |> group(columns:["source"])
  |> keep(columns: ["in_power", "_field", "_value", "source"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  // For sorting data (replaces |>last())
  |> group()
  //|> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  //|> unique(column: "source")
  |> sort(columns: ["source"], desc: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:[], columnKey: ["source"], valueColumn: "_value")

from(bucket: "bucket1")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "Cisco-IOS-XR-envmon-oper:power-management/rack/producers/producer-nodes/producer-node" and 
    (
    r._field == "pem_info_array/voltage_out" or
    r._field == "pem_info_array/current_out"
    )and
    r.source == "${8k_host}"
    )
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {"pem_info_array/voltage_out": "voltage_out", "pem_info_array/current_out": "current_out"})
  |> keep(columns: ["voltage_out", "current_out", "_field", "_value", "_time", "node", "name", "pem_info_array/node_name", "pem_info_array/node_type", "pem_info_array/node_status", "source"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    out_power: (float(v: r.voltage_out)/1000.0) * (float(v: r.current_out)/1000.0),
   }))
  |> last(column: "out_power")
  |> keep(columns: ["out_power", "_field", "_value", "_time", "source"])
  |> sum(column: "out_power")
